Title: Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie
Writer: Nicholas Stoller (screenplay by), Dav Pilkey (based on the epic novels by), David Soren (additional screenplay material by)
Actors: Kevin Hart, Ed Helms, Nick Kroll, Thomas Middleditch
Plot: Two overly imaginative pranksters named George and Harold hypnotize their principal into thinking he's a ridiculously enthusiastic, incredibly dimwitted superhero named Captain Underpants.
Production: DreamWorks Animation, Mikros Image, Scholastic Entertainment Inc.
